intro: Evaiezoa nutans, commonly known as the drooping evaiezoa, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Euphorbiaceae. It is characterized by its pendulous inflorescences and small, inconspicuous flowers. The plant typically grows in tropical and subtropical regions, often in shaded environments. Its leaves are alternate and ovate, with a smooth margin. Evaiezoa nutans is noted for its ability to thrive in moist, well-drained soils.
